alert.note: Alert for Northern Trinity (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 11 at 11:15PM PDT until March 12 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Eureka
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PDT SUNDAY ABOVE 4000 FEET... * WHAT...Snow expected above 4000 feet. Total snow accumulations of up to 3 inches, with higher amounts above 5,000 feet. * WHERE...Northern Trinity County. This may impact Hwy 3 on the higher passes and intermittently Hwy 299 at Buckhorn Summit this morning. * WHEN...Until 8 AM PDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels are expected to rise through tonight and Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state of California can be obtained by calling 1-800-GAS-ROAD.
